name: Pulppy
tagline: Linear Programming software for optimizing various practical problems of Operations Research.
body:
## **Features**
It aims to resolve linear models with a intuitive, simple and multi platform graphical interface that deals with practical problems of Operative Research of "Integer", "Binary", "Continuous" and "Mixed" types.
The project has the following dependencies: [PuLP](https://github.com/coin-or/pulp), [PyQt5](https://riverbankcomputing.com/software/pyqt/intro), [Clp](https://projects.coin-or.org/Clp), [Matplotlib](http://matplotlib.org/) and [Numpy](https://github.com/numpy/numpy).

![](https://github.com/bruino/pulppy/raw/master/capture_pulppy.png).

## **Download Free**
-    [**Download**](https://github.com/bruino/pulppy/raw/master/Pulppy_Windows.zip) _Pulppy for Windows_
-    [**Download**](https://github.com/bruino/pulppy/raw/master/Pulppy_Linux.zip) _Pulppy for Gnu/Linux_

## **Origin**
This software was made to accomplish a university project for the "Operative Research" course of the [Universidad Tecnológica Nacional - Facultad Regional Tucumán](http://www.frt.utn.edu.ar/). For any questions or suggestions, reach me at: bruino.one[at]gmail.com

## **Authors**
-    [Danert, Jessica](https://github.com/jesdan)
-    [Gutierrez Nofal, Mariano](https://github.com/Mago91)
-    [Moreno, Ricardo](https://github.com/Rickywep)
-    [Sarverry, Bruno](https://github.com/bruino)
